shorts.title: Police say man arrested after making threats to school

shorts.description: SOUTH ABINGTON TOWNSHIP, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A Throop man has been arrested after police say he made threats to a local high school in Lackawanna County. South Abington Police were notified of a threat of violence made to Abington Heights High School on Monday. They say the school was investigated and secured until 20-year-old [...]
